select COM_CODE, PODT_CODE, prod_detail(PODT_CODE) as podtName, MAN_STARTDATE, COM_ETC from manufacture_command_d where 1=1
and man_startdate = #{manStartdate}
and com_etc = '생산중'
and com_etc = '생산완료'
select a.com_Code, b.mat_lotno as rscLot, b.rsc_Code, prod_detail(b.rsc_Code) as rscName from manufacture_command_d a join materials_LOT b on a.com_code = b.com_Code where b.com_Code= #{comCode}
